Title: Munnariyippu
Actors: Mammootty, Aparna Gopinath, Saiju Kurup, Joy Mathew
Plot: Anjali, a freelance journalist meets C.K. Raghavan, an interesting inmate who's outstaying his sentence in jail for a crime he says he didn't commit. His vastly different views peak her interest and she documents his life and happenings.
